content.question: In which of the following tubes did the greatest reduction of <math alttext="D C P I P" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>DCPIP</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> occur after <math alttext="60" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>60</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> minutes?

skill.text: 4.B: Describe data from a table or graph, including: i. identifying specific data points ii. describing trends and patterns in the data iii. describing relationships between variables
